name: se-ssa-i
title: Space Exploration Integration: Space Age
author: xkyouchoux
description:
Currently adds: 
Stack inserters and belt stacking
Cryogenic plant
Electromagnetic plant
Foundry
Tesla turret (optional)
Rocket turret (optional)
Agricultural tower (optional)
Biochamber (optional)
Captive biter spawners (optional)
Yumako and jellynut (optional)
Heating tower (optional)
Turbo belts (optional)

to space exploration.
